name: Southmoreland on the Plaza

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at Southmoreland on Veteran's Day, as part of their room giveaway to veterans. We arrived to find a roaring fire, wine, cheese, and fabulous cupcakes, complete with American flags. The staff was inviting and helpful and gave us a tour, and helped bring luggage to our room. The location is perfect for exploring the Plaza area, just a few blocks away. We had dinner and drinks on the Plaza and returned to our room. It is always a pleasure when a property provides special extras, in this case: a decanter of sherry in our room, a sleep/noise machine, and a wood burning fire place that was prepped during turn down service. The Southmoreland has a lovely outdoor area that we hope to experience on a return trip during warmer weather.
reviews.title: Southmoreland thought of every detail

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Greeted by a lovely host, amazing and delicious breakfast, comfortable room and beautiful surroundings. We were walking distance to the plaza and art museums in a safe quiet neighborhood. The grounds were set up to sit, read, and relax as was the house. When we returned at night to cookies and coffee or tea to slip up to our beautiful room or relax on the outside deck to watch the stars was a perfect evening! We will return again. Thanks to the hosts for our stay in their lovely home.
reviews.title: Relaxing location near the Country Club Plaza

reviews.text: To say that it is hard to know where to stay in a city that you know nothing about is difficult is an understatement. We were not sure on Southmoreland but I can only tell you after our stay is it was PERFECT!
reviews.title: PERFECT!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Everyone who was staying there as well as our hosts were nice with no problem no noise, the air was cold plenty of hot water and the food was PERFECT!
reviews.title: We are coming back

reviews.text: If you live in KC you need to stay for the weekend if not.............Go to KC and stay at Southmoreland.
reviews.title: A Kansas City Jewel
